description: Akane resigns from her movie role and is replaced by Yoriko; Abuto suggests Asumi should play Yoriko`s previous role. Tensions amongst Arayashiki members are rising but Rumiko demands neither Yoriko nor Kyouta can be attacked. Sadamura asks Abuto for a photo shooting with Yoriko but gets a deal with Abuto`s new assistant Kiriko instead. Kanae attacks Yoriko again but fails miserably; Asumi challenges Yoriko for a power struggle, getting her hospitalized. And Kyouta plays a song just for Yoriko.
